com.loopj.android.jpush.http

类 MySSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • SSLSocketFactory
      • com.loopj.android.jpush.http.MySSLSocketFactory

  • public class MySSLSocketFactory
extends SSLSocketFactory
    This file is introduced to fix HTTPS Post bug on API < ICS see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=13117#c14

     

    Warning! This omits SSL certificate validation on every device, use with caution

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MySSLSocketFactory(java.security.KeyStore truststore)
      Creates a new SSL Socket Factory with the given KeyStore.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      java.net.Socket createSocket(java.net.Socket socket, java.lang.String host, int port, boolean autoClose) 
      void fixHttpsURLConnection()
      Makes HttpsURLConnection trusts a set of certificates specified by the KeyStore
      static SSLSocketFactory getFixedSocketFactory()
      Returns a SSlSocketFactory which trusts all certificates
      static java.security.KeyStore getKeystore()
      Gets a Default KeyStore
      static java.security.KeyStore getKeystoreOfCA(java.io.InputStream cert)
      Gets a KeyStore containing the Certificate
      static DefaultHttpClient getNewHttpClient(java.security.KeyStore keyStore)
      Gets a DefaultHttpClient which trusts a set of certificates specified by the KeyStore

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MySSLSocketFactory

        public MySSLSocketFactory(java.security.KeyStore truststore)
                   throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          java.security.KeyManagementException,
                          java.security.KeyStoreException,
                          java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException
        Creates a new SSL Socket Factory with the given KeyStore.
        参数:
        truststore - A KeyStore to create the SSL Socket Factory in context of
        抛出:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.KeyManagementException - KeyManagementException
        java.security.KeyStoreException - KeyStoreException
        java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException - UnrecoverableKeyException

        返回:
